Let's try one more time. 🤞🏽

Oh no! I you did not tap a button. Tap the button below to confirm your decision.

Let's try one more time. 🤞🏽

We promise not to share your information with anyone else.

If all this sounds good, accept to opt in to our service. 

You can visit the link below to review our full privacy policy when you have time.

🎉 *Thank you for opting into our service!* 

We are excited to work with you improve the learning outcomes for children with ongoing behaviour and learning challenges.

I’m Hubeta, your AI therapy assistant 🤖 

I’ll be your companion, providing personalised guidance and valuable resources to help improve the learning outcomes of children with behaviour or developmental challenges *Autism*, *ADHD* and more!

Before we continue, I need to ask for your permission to send you notifications, messages and replies through WhatsApp, so that we can create some delightful plans for you.

Your data will be:
* stored securely🔒
* used only for analysis 📊 
* deleted upon request 🗑️

_You have total control over what we do with your data._

Do you agree?
The button is not linked with any card. Please link a card to proceed.
